caption: Two men are standing face to face and talk in a place looks like underground. Then one of the men walk ahead and takes a hand of another man and say something. They have an argument.  Then, that man walks away while waving his umbrella in his hand. A woman looks like secretary walk up and send the man back home. After arriving home, the man finds another man lying on a sofa. He gives his phone to that man, but that man just says something and gives it back. Then the man begins to type something on then cellphone while that man takes out a pink suitcase..
